content: Just like this, {A点地舞}simple moves, but packed with emotion — Kula bata!
info: NPC成长等级-1级演出-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: There's a tradition on the plains where I grew up: to dance all night long on days of celebration. It's just some light dancing, of course, nothing intensive...
info: NPC成长等级-1级演出-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: I'll teach you this <style=Highlight>Tap Dance</style> right now, and when the next celebration comes around, let's dance together! Of course, I'm always up for a dance-off when you feel like it!
info: NPC成长等级-1级演出-1013萨飞里_萨飞里
